Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Chengdu, Fraser Suites Chengdu is minutes from Tianfu Square and Sichuan Museum of Science and Technology. This 4.5-star aparthotel is within close proximity of Chengdu City Sports Center and Renmin Park.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 360 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens with full-sized refrigerators/freezers and microwaves. LCD televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreation amenities such as a health club or take in the view from a terrace. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the aparthotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or grab a snack at a coffee shop/café.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, luggage storage, and laundry facilities. Planning an event in Chengdu? This aparthotel has facilities measuring 116 square feet (11 square meters), including meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the aparthotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or grab a snack at a coffee shop/café.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Enjoy recreation amenities such as a health club or take in the view from a terrace. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Located in Chengdu, Fraser Suites Chengdu is minutes from Tianfu Square and Sichuan Museum of Science and Technology. This 4.5-star aparthotel is within close proximity of Chengdu City Sports Center and Renmin Park.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Tianfu Square - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Sichuan Museum of Science and Technology - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Chengdu City Sports Center - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Renmin Park - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Wuhou Ci - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Wide and Narrow Street - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Wenshu Monastery - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Sichuan University - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
Chengdu United States Consulate - 3 km / 1.9 mi
Yong Ling - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Du Fu Caotang - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi
Southwest Jiaotong University - 5.3 km / 3.3 mi
Jinsha Museum - 6.1 km / 3.8 mi
Sichuan Normal University - 6.9 km / 4.3 mi
Chengdu University of Technology - 7.1 km / 4.4 mi

The preferred airport for Fraser Suites Chengdu is Chengdu (CTU-Shuangliu Intl.) - 13.2 km / 8.2 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
